page.title: 01INTRODUCTION
page.content: THIS BLOCK IS{RURAL}IN CHARACTER, MAINLY FARMLAND, WITH A SCATTERED POPULATION. THE FARMS ARE RUN ON A MIXED SYSTEM WITH DAIRYING AND ARABLE CROPS, MAINLY POTATOES,BARLEY AND WHEAT, ALSO VEGETABLES AND FODDER CROPS. OVER HALF THE AREA IS COVERED BY {TATTON PARK}AND TATTON ESTATE FARMS { ROSTHERNE} WAS, AND TO SOME EXTENT, STILL IS AN ESTATE VILLAGE. .THE BUSY{A556}TRAVERSES THE BLOCK CONNECTING WITH THE {M6 AND M56} JUST OUTSIDE THE AREA. MANY OF THE FIELDS HAVE PONDS AND THERE ARE THREE MERES;ROSTHERNE, ONE OF THE PRETTIEST CHESHIRE MERES, MELCHETT MERE AND MERE MERE WHICH IS SURROUNDED BY HIGH CLASS HOUSING AND A GOLF COURSE.THERE ARE THE REMAINS OF 2 CORN MILLS.{BUCKLOW} WAS THE NAME OF ONE OF THE CHESHIRE HUNDRED DIVISIONS,
